Docs.summary: Gets the number of horizontal color zones.

remarks.para: Gets the number of horizontal color zones.
A color zone is a group of lights that always display the same color.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns true if the black portion of the screen in letter box mode is omitted; false otherwise.

remarks.para: Returns true if the black portion of the screen in letter box mode is omitted; false otherwise.
Letter-box is a technique to keep the original aspect ratio when displayed on a screen with different aspect ratio. Black bars are added to the top and bottom.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets the detection threshold of the ambient light.

remarks.para: Gets the detection threshold of the ambient light.
If the color of a color zone is changed but the difference is smaller than the threshold, the change is ignored.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
